ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never seen a demon claw at 500pp; if your getting it fo that much I would say buy it. They are low weight, and very fast. Defintely worth the money unless
ygData.messageBody:
I've never seen a demon claw at 500pp; if your getting it fo that much I
would say buy it. They are low weight, and very fast. Defintely worth
the money unless your heading into lower guk anytime soon and getting
some of the great stuff there. At 30 I wouldn't expect you to pay for
one anyway. Pick up digs and head into Cazic-thule and start hunting up
that rubicite. The same guy with the breastplate has the claw. I'm kinda
surprised you haven't hunted it down yet, as on Solusek Ro I rarely see
someone above 30 or so not in cazic-thule once they've been there a few
days, and I kinda feel bad that I haven't gotten it once, though I have
hunted in groups that kiled both golems, and many tae ews, considering
I've hunted there for quite some time now.

Talonus DuPrey
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro

lankyak@... wrote:
>
> From: lankyak@...
>
> Anyways, is a demon claw worth 500 pp? It's a dam 5 delay 19 weapon and comes off the Avatar of Fear in Cazic.
> I don't want to shell out my entire bank just because it's the loot of a high level creature.
>
> Level 30 bard
> Povar
